content.html: To my comment on the word "P*ki" being unacceptable and not banter, here are some responses on Linked In. People with their job titles clearly in the public domain and zero issues with defending the use of the term Good morning to you all.
content.value:
To my comment on the word "P*ki" being unacceptable and not banter, here are some responses on Linked In.

People with their job titles clearly in the public domain and zero issues with defending the use of the term

Good morning to you all.
